titleStmt.title: The oracle of God A sermon appointed for the Crosse, and preached in the Cathedrall Church of St. Paul, in London, on the 20. day of December, being the Sunday before Christmasse, anno Dom. 1635. By Iohn Gore rector of Wenden-lofts in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Gore, John, Rector of Wendenlofts, Essex.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J.P. and are to be sold by Andrew Greeke and Charles Greene,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
